Package uk.ac.ucl.comp0010.controller

Class StudentController

java.lang.Object
uk.ac.ucl.comp0010.controller.StudentController
@RestController @RequestMapping("/students") public class StudentController extends Object
A controller managing student objects.

  • Method Details

    • addStudent

      @PostMapping("/addStudent") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Student> addStudent(@RequestBody Map<String,String> params)
      Creates a new student and saves it to the database.
      Parameters:
      params - a map containing student details (first name, last name, username, email)
      Returns:
      the created student object in the response body

    • getAllStudents

      @GetMapping("/all") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<List<Student>> getAllStudents()
      Retrieves all students from the database.
      Returns:
      a list of all student objects

    • getStudentById

      @GetMapping("/{student_id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> getStudentById(@PathVariable("student_id") Long studentId)
      Retrieves a student by their ID.
      Parameters:
      studentId - the ID of the student to retrieve
      Returns:
      the student object corresponding to the provided ID

    • updateStudent

      @PutMapping("/update/{student_id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Student> updateStudent(@PathVariable("student_id") Long studentId, @RequestBody Map<String,String> params)
      Updates the details of an existing student.
      Parameters:
      studentId - the ID of the student to update
      params - a map containing the updated student details : first name, last name, username and email
      Returns:
      the updated student object

    • deleteStudent

      @DeleteMapping("/delete/{student_id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<String> deleteStudent(@PathVariable("student_id") Long studentId)
      Deletes a student by their ID.
      Parameters:
      studentId - the ID of the student to delete
      Returns:
      a message indicating the student was successfully deleted
